starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_host_feast: Welcome to my estate, $string. You are under my protection here; please make yourself at home.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_upstanding_feast: Greetings $string. Let us put our troubles to the morrow, for tonight we will feast and make merry.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_martial_feast: Fancy seeing you here, $string. Say, shall we join the tournament later?
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_calculating_feast: Good evening $string. I must say I'm impressed at the generosity of our host. This decor can't have been cheap.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_quarrelsome_feast: Hey $string, can you believe the quality of the drinks here? I've found better wine in the cellar of a Luddic nun.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_upstanding_first: Peace to you, and always remember to temper your valor with mercy, your courage with honor.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_martial_first: Well met! A fellow warrior I see; that fleet of yours definitely isn't just for show!
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_calculating_first: Ah, yes. At last we meet. You seem like a good person to know. Let us speak together from time to time.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_quarrelsome_first: I've heard of you. Well, I'm not one for bandying words, so if you have anything to say, out with it.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_upstanding_hated: I have no need to speak to one of such low character as yourself, $string.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_martial_hated: Your presence is acknowledged, $string. I advise you choose your words carefully if you don't want a bullet in the skull.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_calculating_hated: You best have something interesting to make it worth me suffering your presence, $string
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_quarrelsome_hated: Ah, $string, the snake dares to slither in the open. Convince me why I shouldn't open fire immediately.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_upstanding_disliked: You are trying my patience, $string. Speak if you must.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_martial_disliked: Speak quickly $string. I'd prefer to avoid the shame of being seen in your presence.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_calculating_disliked: I suppose it would be prudent for me to entertain you, $string, however much I would rather not.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_quarrelsome_disliked: $string, do yourself a favor and stay out of my way.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_upstanding_neutral: Good day $string, I trust that you've conducted yourself honorably since our last meeting.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_martial_neutral: Good hunting, $string. May your armor hold fast and your missiles strike true.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_calculating_neutral: Greetings $string, what news can you share from your travels?
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_quarrelsome_neutral: Well you caught me in a good mood, $string. What do you want?
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_upstanding_friendly: $string, my friend. It is good to see you alive and well. What is it?
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_martial_friendly: Hail, $string. Spare me a minute, for you must tell me of your latest adventures!
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_calculating_friendly: Good to see you, $string. What can I do for you today?
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_quarrelsome_friendly: I'm pleasantly surprised that you haven't managed to get yourself killed yet, $string. Can't say I'm surprised at this point.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_upstanding_trusted: $string, my dear friend. It is good to see you alive and well. What is it?
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_martial_trusted: Hail, $string. Remind me next time we're at the space bar, I've got story to tell about my new scar. Ha!
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_calculating_trusted: Good to see you, $string. Let us speak plainly.
starlords_lords_dialog.greeting_quarrelsome_trusted: $string, just the person I wanted to see. You sure are a breath of fresh air compared to the rest of these bastards.
starlords_lords_dialog.worldview_upstanding: In these difficult times, order and hierarchy are necessary to keep the peace and prevent the war of all against all, yet that must not blind us to the possibility of injustice.
starlords_lords_dialog.worldview_martial: My sword is at the disposal of my rightful liege, so long as he upholds his duty to me.
starlords_lords_dialog.worldview_calculating: Well, it's a harsh world, and it is our lot to face harsh choices. Each of us must remain vigilant of our own interests, yet I do not mind aiding those who will help me in return.
starlords_lords_dialog.worldview_quarrelsome: My philosophy is simple: it is better to be the wolf than the lamb. I try to make sure that the ones who wrong me learn to regret it.
starlords_lords_dialog.liege_opinion_hated: I've been waiting for any chance to escape the iron fist of $string. Might you have any ideas?
starlords_lords_dialog.liege_opinion_disliked: It's no secret that I have been unhappy with $string.
starlords_lords_dialog.liege_opinion_neutral: $string is my liege. That's all I'll say on the matter.
starlords_lords_dialog.liege_opinion_friendly: I have no quarrel with $string. They treat their subordinates with a firm but fair hand.
starlords_lords_dialog.liege_opinion_trusted: $string is my trusted friend and role model. They are a paragon of what it means to be a leader.
starlords_lords_dialog.liege_opinion_decentralized_hated: To be frank, things have been harsh on us. It's struggle just to make sure my crew doesn't starve.
starlords_lords_dialog.liege_opinion_decentralized_disliked: It's no secret that our fleet has fallen on hard times, though we still have plenty of fight left.
starlords_lords_dialog.liege_opinion_decentralized_neutral: Life is as it always has been in the sector, full of danger but also opportunity.
starlords_lords_dialog.liege_opinion_decentralized_friendly: Life is not without challenge, but my operations are slowly expanding with each passing day.
starlords_lords_dialog.liege_opinion_decentralized_trusted: I have influence and wealth that rivals that of many kings. I'm quite satisfied with the state of affairs.
starlords_lords_dialog.battle_upstanding: $string! Stand down now, if not for your own sake, at least for the sake of your crew.
starlords_lords_dialog.battle_martial: $string! I've been waiting for the day that we might see which of us is the strongest. En garde!
starlords_lords_dialog.battle_calculating: I have you cornered, $string. Surrender or die!
starlords_lords_dialog.battle_quarrelsome: You've caught me in a bad mood, $string. Turning your fleet to scrap metal might cheer me up though. Die!
starlords_lords_dialog.refuse_mercy: That may be, but I wish to fight you.
starlords_lords_dialog.accept_mercy: Well... I suppose I do owe you a debt. So be it, leave now. We never saw each other.
starlords_lords_dialog.no_quest_available: I have no tasks that need attending to at this time.
starlords_lords_dialog.quest_available: I do have one issue to take care of. I've transferred the relevant information if you're interested.
starlords_lords_dialog.refuse_speak_privately_upstanding: Do not take this amiss, but I would prefer to conduct our affairs out in the open.
starlords_lords_dialog.refuse_speak_privately_martial: Forgive me, but I'm not one for going off in corners to plot.
starlords_lords_dialog.refuse_speak_privately_calculating: Erm... Let's keep our affairs out in the open, for the time being.
starlords_lords_dialog.refuse_speak_privately_quarrelsome: Bah. I don't like you that much. I'm not going to go plot with you in some corner.
starlords_lords_dialog.refuse_suggest_action_relations: I'm sorry, but I don't know you well enough.
starlords_lords_dialog.refuse_suggest_action_busy: I'm sorry, but I have other matters to attend to.
starlords_lords_dialog.consider_suggest_action: Very well, I'm listening. But if this goes poorly, I will hold you responsible.
starlords_lords_dialog.accept_speak_privately: Very well, what did you wish to discuss?
starlords_lords_dialog.accept_ask_location: Who did you wish to inquire about?
starlords_lords_dialog.suggest_defect: I'd like to ask for your support in uniting the sector under $string.
starlords_lords_dialog.confirm_suggest_defect: It's time for you to make a decision.
starlords_lords_dialog.abort_suggest_defect: You don't have to respond now, but think on my proposal.
starlords_lords_dialog.bargain_defect: And pray tell, what are you offering to justify that claim?
starlords_lords_dialog.bargain_defect_nothing: We can agree on something at a later date.
starlords_lords_dialog.consider_defect: Oh? You speak of treason, friend. Why should I let you say another word?
starlords_lords_dialog.suggest_defection_upstanding: Only I can bring peace to citizens of the sector.
starlords_lords_dialog.suggest_defection_martial: In times of turmoil, might makes right. And I am the strongest.
starlords_lords_dialog.suggest_defection_calculating: I will make it well worth your time.
starlords_lords_dialog.suggest_defection_quarrelsome: With me, you'll have your revenge on those who wronged you.
starlords_lords_dialog.suggest_defection_abort: Lighten up, it was just a joke.
starlords_lords_dialog.accept_defect: You are right, $string. I will join you in your conquests. I hereby swear my fleet and holdings to your service. Hail $string, rightful ruler of the sector!
starlords_lords_dialog.refuse_defect: I cannot betray our leader. I will keep this conversation to myself for sake of our friendship, but do not speak of this again.
starlords_lords_dialog.option_ask_location: Ask about the location of someone.
starlords_lords_dialog.option_ask_quest: Ask if they have any tasks for you.
starlords_lords_dialog.option_sway_council: Persuade them to $string the currently debated proposal.
starlords_lords_dialog.option_sway_player: Persuade them to support your proposal.
starlords_lords_dialog.option_refuse_sway: I'm sorry, but I've already made up my mind on the matter.
starlords_lords_dialog.option_accept_sway_bargain: We have a deal then. I'll do as you ask.
starlords_lords_dialog.option_accept_sway_redundant: Er... I already agree with you, though I must say that our talk has reinforced my view.
starlords_lords_dialog.option_accept_sway: Of course friend, now that you explain it that way, I agree with you.
starlords_lords_dialog.option_bargain_sway_support: Hmm... I don't mind lending you a hand, but I have my own proposal that I would expect you to support in return.
starlords_lords_dialog.option_bargain_sway_money: Hmm... your argument would be a lot more convincing if it was a lot... weightier, if you know what I'm saying.
starlords_lords_dialog.option_ask_worldview: What do you think, in general terms, about the current state of affairs in the realm?
starlords_lords_dialog.option_ask_liege_opinion_decentralized: How do you feel about your current conditions?
starlords_lords_dialog.option_avoid_battle: Hold your fire! I do not wish to fight you.
starlords_lords_dialog.current_task_desc_none: I am still considering my next assignment.
starlords_lords_dialog.current_task_desc_feast: I am attending a feast at $string.
starlords_lords_dialog.current_task_desc_patrol: We are scouting for the enemy around $string. I will guard the areas near my home.
starlords_lords_dialog.current_task_desc_collect_taxes: I am collecting taxes from my administered areas. It has been too long since I have returned home, and I must see to my demesne.
starlords_lords_dialog.current_task_desc_upgrade_fleet: I am upgrading my fleet at $string. I will need additional firepower to deal with threats to the realm.
starlords_lords_dialog.current_task_desc_venture: I am headed on a business venture to $string. This will yield additional funds for maintaining and expanding my fleet.
starlords_lords_dialog.current_task_desc_raid: I am raiding $string. We must keep up the pressure and cripple the enemy's war effort.
starlords_lords_dialog.current_task_desc_defend: I am flying to the defense of $string. I've received word of enemy activity in the area.
starlords_lords_dialog.current_task_desc_campaign: I am on campaign. The realm's navy is still being assembled.
starlords_lords_dialog.current_task_desc_campaign2: I am on campaign. Our current target is $string.

starlords_ui.lord_defection: The treacherous $string has betrayed $string and defected to $string!
starlords_ui.feast_start: $string invites the Lords of the realm to a feast at $string
starlords_ui.feast_end: After weeks of revelry, the feast at $string has ended
starlords_ui.campaign_start: Marshal $string has raised the realm's navy at $string. All lords must answer the call!
starlords_ui.campaign_end: The campaign has ended and lords given leave to attend to their individual duties.
starlords_ui.laws_crown_authority_3: 2x Ruler Political Weight Modifier|Unlocks Force Pass
starlords_ui.laws_crown_authority_tooltip: Determines the influence of the ruler on the council.
starlords_ui.laws_noble_authority_0: All votes are equal|-100% Base Income from Rank |+50% Lord Base Income
starlords_ui.laws_noble_authority_1: +50% Political Weight from Rank|-50% Base Income from Rank |+25% Lord Base Income
starlords_ui.laws_noble_authority_3: +200% Political Weight from Rank|+50% Base Income from Rank |-25% Lord Base Income
starlords_ui.laws_noble_authority_4: +300% Political Weight from Rank|+100% Base Income from Rank |-50% Lord Base Income
starlords_ui.laws_noble_authority_tooltip: Determines the influence of high-ranking lords on the council
starlords_ui.laws_trade_law_tooltip: Higher levels increase taxation while lowering business income for lords. Taxation is better when your faction has many fiefs, while trade is better when you have many allies.
starlords_ui.laws_feast_law_tooltip: Regulates how often lords may take time off their duties to feast
starlords_ui.laws_tooltip: Displays the laws of your faction. You can also choose to propose various legislation. Your proposal will be added alongside everyone else's and voted on in order of popularity in the council.
